gw.api.admin

Class BaseAdminUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.BaseAdminUtil

  • public class BaseAdminUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with objects in the Admin area of Guidewire's applications. These utilities are generally useful and are not specific to any single application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Region[] AllRegions
      Returns all the regions sorted by name.
      static IQueryBeanResult<Role> AllRoles
      Returns all the roles in the system as entities. We could use a query to fetch the roles. But there should be at most a hundred or so roles in the system and they should all be cached so we may as well fetch all the Role entities, which gives us more flexibility for sorting.
      static boolean CurrentUserSystemUser
      Determines if the current user is the system user.
      static boolean DecentralizedAdminEnabled
      Is decentralized admin enabled for the system.
      static Country DefaultCountry
      Returns the default country. This is the current users' default country (User.DefaultCountry), if set, or the server default country (DefaultCountryCode from config.xml).
      static List<Object> GroupsForCurrentUser
      Return a list of all groups of which the current user is a member, sorted by display name.
      static ZoneType[] RegionZoneTypesForDefaultCountry
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      static List<Object> UsersInCurrentUsersGroups
      Return a list of all users who share membership of a group with the current user, sorted by display name.
      static boolean ZoneConfigurationValid
      Returns true if zone config is valid, false otherwise.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges(Role role)
      If the given role has duplicate privileges in its privileges array, returns an error message describing the first duplicate privilege found. Otherwise returns null.

      Using this method to validate the roles array doesn't help overall correctness - the database would reject the duplicate role in any case - but does improve the error message for the user.
      static void deleteActivityPattern(ActivityPattern activityPattern)
      Deletes the given activity pattern and commits the change immediately.
      static void deleteActivityPatterns(ActivityPattern[] activityPatterns)
      Deletes the given activity patterns and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the activity patterns will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      static void deleteAttributes(Attribute[] attributesToDelete)
      Deletes the given attributes and commits the change immediately.
      static void deleteBusinessWeeks(BusinessWeek[] businessWeeks)
      static void deleteGroup(Group group)
      Deletes the given group and commits the change immediately.
      static void deleteHolidays(Holiday[] holidays)
      Deletes the given holidays and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the holidays will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      static void deleteOrganization(Organization org)
      Deletes the given organization and commits the change immediately.
      static void deleteRegions(Region[] regions)
      Deletes the given regions and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRegions linked to the given regions, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted region. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the regions will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      static void deleteRoles(Role[] roles)
      Deletes the given roles and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRoles linked to the given roles, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted role. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the roles will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      static void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes the given user and immediately commits the change.
      static void exportData(ExportDataInfo exportInfo)
      Writes an XML representation of the given export data to the current HTTP response. Should only be used to generate the complete response to a web request, to download the given data to the user
      static IQueryBeanResult<Organization> findAllOrganizations()
      Return all the organizations in the system that have zones.
      static IQueryBeanResult<Organization> findAllOrganizationsWithZones()
      Return all the organizations in the system.
      static Region[] getAllRegions()
      Returns all the regions sorted by name.
      static IQueryBeanResult<Role> getAllRoles()
      Returns all the roles in the system as entities. We could use a query to fetch the roles. But there should be at most a hundred or so roles in the system and they should all be cached so we may as well fetch all the Role entities, which gives us more flexibility for sorting.
      static Country getDefaultCountry()
      Returns the default country. This is the current users' default country (User.DefaultCountry), if set, or the server default country (DefaultCountryCode from config.xml).
      static List<Object> getGroupsForCurrentUser()
      Return a list of all groups of which the current user is a member, sorted by display name.
      static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypes(Country country)
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypesForDefaultCountry()
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypesWithGranularity(Country country)
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      static List<Object> getUsersInCurrentUsersGroups()
      Return a list of all users who share membership of a group with the current user, sorted by display name.
      static boolean isCurrentUserSystemUser()
      Determines if the current user is the system user.
      static boolean isDecentralizedAdminEnabled()
      Is decentralized admin enabled for the system.
      static boolean isZoneConfigurationValid()
      Returns true if zone config is valid, false otherwise.
      static void setCurrentUsersLanguage(LanguageType language)
      Sets the language of the current user according to the given language type and immediately commits the change.
      static void setCurrentUsersLocale(LocaleType locale)
      Sets the regional settings/formatting locale of the current user according to the given language type and immediately commits the change.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns all the regions sorted by name.

      • AllRoles

        IQueryBeanResult<Role> AllRoles
        Returns all the roles in the system as entities. We could use a query to fetch the roles. But there should be at most a hundred or so roles in the system and they should all be cached so we may as well fetch all the Role entities, which gives us more flexibility for sorting.

        Determines if the current user is the system user.

    • Method Detail

      • checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges

        String checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges(Role role)
        If the given role has duplicate privileges in its privileges array, returns an error message describing the first duplicate privilege found. Otherwise returns null.

        Using this method to validate the roles array doesn't help overall correctness - the database would reject the duplicate role in any case - but does improve the error message for the user.

        Parameters:
        role -
        Returns:

      • deleteActivityPattern

        void deleteActivityPattern(ActivityPattern activityPattern)
        Deletes the given activity pattern and commits the change immediately.
        Parameters:
        activityPattern - the pattern to be deleted

      • deleteActivityPatterns

        void deleteActivityPatterns(ActivityPattern[] activityPatterns)
        Deletes the given activity patterns and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the activity patterns will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
        Parameters:
        activityPatterns - the patterns to be deleted

        Deletes the given holidays and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the holidays will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
        Parameters:

        void deleteOrganization(Organization org)
        Deletes the given organization and commits the change immediately.

      • deleteRegions

        void deleteRegions(Region[] regions)
        Deletes the given regions and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRegions linked to the given regions, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted region. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the regions will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
        Parameters:
        regions - the regions to be deleted

      • deleteRoles

        void deleteRoles(Role[] roles)
        Deletes the given roles and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRoles linked to the given roles, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted role. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the roles will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
        Parameters:
        roles - the roles to be deleted
